alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms with gusty outflow winds will impact portions of southwestern Box Elder and northwestern Tooele Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 432 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Montello to 15 miles northeast of Ibapah. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Utah Test and Training Range North, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Lucin and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 45. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 0 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
